ygData.subject: Re: Geez!
ygData.msgSnippet: No kidding, especially don t count on information from guides. They are nothing but regular players such as you and I. They don t get any inside information. I
ygData.messageBody:
No kidding, especially don't count on information from guides. They are
nothing but regular players such as you and I. They don't get any inside
information. I know this because my best friend in real life is a guide on
EQ. They are really nothing more than a filter for stupid questions.


----- Original Message -----
From: Big Dave <xceller@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 16, 1999 11:00 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Geez!


> From: Big Dave <xceller@...>
>
> How do you know Josh? Are you one of Verant's game designers, planners,
> programmers, or developers? Are you related to any of them and they have
told
> you this is a fact? Or are you as ignorant as the rest of us and just
going by
> what someone told you?
> There are enough rumors and disinformation about the 3rd book, collapsible
> fishing pole, and fireworks going around that I wonder if anyone on any
server
> really has solid information. Until I recieve some word by an Everquest
> programmer or developer I'm keeping my mind open.
> Don't count any information you have been told by the guides or GM's as
> factual. None of them created this game.
>
> Joshua Bednarz wrote:
>
> > From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
> >
> > What will it take to get it through to you guys? There is NO damn third
> > book, ANY formulas for items that have been figured out how to be made,
if
> > any at all were figured out by trial and error. There is absolutely NO
BOOK!
> > NONE not -ANYWHERE- in the game! When there IS something will be said
about
> > it in the patch. Until then , just work on raising your tinkering skill,
> > thats all I can say, doing anything else about tinkering, like trying to
> > find a non-existant book, or trying to figure out a formula with next to
> > nothing odds is just a TOTAL 100% waste of time!
> >
> >
>
>
